response.explain: The previous action code was executed successfully without any errors. The robot has moved to the box of cereal as planned in the first subtask. Now, the robot needs to grasp the box of cereal.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the box of cereal.
(2) Grasp the box of cereal.
(3) Move to the cabinet.
(4) Open the cabinet.
(5) Put the box of cereal in the cabinet.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the box of cereal.
    box_of_cereal_90 = registry(env,"box_of_cereal_90")
    EasyGrasp(robot, box_of_cereal_90)
    donothing(env)
